title: Audiosurf 2 (September 19th Update)
description:
Hello again!
This time I present you a great game - Audiosurf 2!

Version: newest (August 19th Update)

Installation: Extract and Play!

Q: IS ONLINE AVAILABLE?
A: Not much, actually. You can use songs from Soundcloud or get Leaderboards, but you can't upload your score or use Steam Workshop (workaround - read below)

Q: How to change my name? I don't want to be just "Player"!
A: Open LumaEmu.ini and edit first two rows with "Player" (I don't know which one exactly, TBH).

Q: You mentioned something about mods...
A: Use steamworkshopdownloader (it ends with com) (I think I cannot post links, so this is a bypass...). You'll find out how to use it then.

Enjoy, and Ride your music!
